resources.string:
v1.1.0 (build 23.0.2)
Copyright \u00a9 2016 hiTour.

v1.1.0
Initial release of v1.1.0, fully built from scratch by Team Stranders (Charlie Baker, Adam Chlupacek, Phileas Hocquard, Kyle Hodgetts, Tahmidul Islam, Ana Jalba, Dominik Kulon, Benjamin Temple) at King\'s College London.

Libraries

The hiTour Android app uses the following 3rd party libraries, resources and tools:
- Design
- Pallete
- Zxing Android Embedded
- Zxing
- CircleImageView
- Retrofit
- Gson
- Converter Gson
